scripts.postinstall: yarn vtv:install && yarn console:install && yarn packages:link
scripts.publish-vtv-pre: cd packages/vtv && yarn version --prerelease --pre-id=canary --no-git-tag-version && yarn publish --no-git-tag-version
scripts.publish-console-pre: cd packages/console && yarn version --prerelease --pre-id=canary --no-git-tag-version && yarn publish --no-git-tag-version
scripts.packages:link:console: cd packages/console/node_modules && rm -rf vtv && ln -s ../../vtv vtv
scripts.packages:link:root: cd node_modules && rm -rf vtv && ln -s ../packages/vtv vtv && mkdir -p @resources && cd @resources && rm -rf console && ln -s ../../packages/console console
scripts.packages:link:desktop: cd packages/desktop-app/node_modules && rm -rf vtv && ln -s ../../vtv vtv && cd @resources && rm -rf console && ln -s ../../../console console
scripts.packages:link:reset: rm node_modules/vtv node_modules/@resources/console packages/console/node_modules/vtv && yarn install
scripts.packages:copy-all-for-desktop: rm -rf packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages && mkdir -p packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages && cp -a packages/vtv packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages/vtv && cp -a packages/console packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages/console
scripts.packages:copy-src-for-desktop: rm -rf packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages/vtv/src && mkdir -p packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages/vtv && cp -r packages/vtv/src packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages/vtv/src && rm -rf packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages/console/src && mkdir -p packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages/console && cp -r packages/console/src packages/desktop-app/renderer/packages/console/src
